content.rendered:
In this classic, the pioneering motivational coach Napoleon Hill teaches how to make the crucial leap from faith to action in bringing your dreams to life.

Believe in yourself… Have faith… We often hear these expressions. But faith is not enough. We need ‘Applied Faith’. In three hard-hitting chapters, Hill teaches you how to transform belief into action, and faith into real-life plans.

Application. Enthusiasm. Action. These are the three keys required to do more than just “believe in yourself”—but to actually BE the person you want to be.
